teaser: Among the 844 pages of the Senate immigration bill are two bits that could complicate the goal of citizenship for many poor immigrants. Entertainment and electronics giant Sony has managed to make money, not lose it for the first time in five years.  TV networks come out with their fall programs next week. But as more people tune in online, many marketers are finding that ads alone aren't enough.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, May 9, 2013
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, May 9, 2013
description: Among the 844 pages of the Senate immigration bill are two bits that could complicate the goal of citizenship for many poor immigrants. Entertainment and electronics giant Sony has managed to make money, not lose it for the first time in five years.  TV networks come out with their fall programs next week. But as more people tune in online, many marketers are finding that ads alone aren't enough.
byline: Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Stacey Vanek Smith, Gigi Douban, Bruce Johnson, David Brancaccio, Chris Farrell, Rupert Wingfield-Hayes and Sabri Ben-Achour
